column1: '''Vinyalondë''' was a harbor founded by [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] and the [[Venturers]] at the mouth of the [[Gwathló]];<ref>{{UT|Wife}}</ref> it was one of the first settlements built by the [[Númenóreans]] in [[Middle-earth]]
column2: and survived (at least in part) into the [[Third Age]] as the port of [[Lond Daer]].<ref>{{UT|6d}}</ref>
